official-title.#text: To promote consumer choice and wireless competition by permitting consumers to unlock mobile wireless devices, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives February 25, 2014.

text.#text: If this Act is enacted before June 1, 2014, the determination under

text.#text: If this Act is enacted on or after June 1, 2014, the determination under

continuation-text.#text: may be initiated by the owner of any such handset or other device, by another person at the direction of the owner, or by a provider of a commercial mobile radio service or a commercial mobile data service at the direction of such owner or other person, solely in order to enable such owner or a family member of such owner to connect to a wireless telecommunications network, when such connection is authorized by the operator of such network.

text.#text: Circumvention of a technological measure that restricts wireless telephone handsets or other wireless devices from connecting to a wireless telecommunications network—

text.#text: Nothing in this subsection shall be construed to permit the unlocking of wireless handsets or other wireless devices, for the purpose of bulk resale, or to authorize the

header.#text: Commercial mobile data service; commercial mobile radio service

quote.#tail: means a network used to provide a commercial mobile radio service or a commercial mobile data service.
mean a handset or other device that operates on a wireless telecommunications network.
